body: Fix SQL user creation with MariaDB ([#4548](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4548))
- Remove deprecated each(). ([#4177](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4177))

- Document and update xhprofCommands. Support both xhprof and tideways ([#4534](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4534))
- Fix [#4536](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4536). Move unish docs ([#4537](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4537))
- Avoid exception when clearing Drushâ€™s own cache files ([#4535](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4535))

- Fix the backup-dir configuration setting ([#4510](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4510))
- Error message from requirements check on updatedb ([#4513](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4513))
- Fix [#4512](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4512). Drush::redispatchOptions() no longer includes shortcut options (-y) ([#4515](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4515))
- Issue [#4032](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4032) queue run lease time ([#4322](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4322))
- Fix [#4134](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4134),[#4438](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4438). Use Guzzle to fetch json in security commands ([#4522](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4522))
- Change how we NULL the cache dir during deploy command. ([#4533](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4533)) 
- Lots of minor docs improvements. See our new site at www.drush.org, including a command list.
Minor bug fixes - https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/compare/10.3.1...10.3.2
- Support Contrib modules with semver releases in Drupal 8. ([#4466](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4466))

- Allow Drush 8 uli to call Drush 10 and get the right reset link. ([#4498](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4498))
- Do not pass --root in sql-sync if it is not set in the alias file. ([#4484](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4484))
- Wrap mysql table names in backticks to avoid errors in MySQL 8  ([#4456](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4456))
- Adjust Drush8 alias files search depth ([#4436](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4436))
- Remove entity_load function in favour of Role::load to be Drupal 9 compatible ([#4431](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4431))

-  Handle semver contrib releases in pm:security ([#4449](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4449))
- Success log message when checking php security updates ([#4446](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4446))

#### Highlights
- Add new pm:security-php command for checking PHP dependencies for vulnerabilities ([#4346](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4346))
- Add new deploy command. Performs site deployment. ([#4359](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4359)) 


#### Other changes
- Add release and EOL dates to Drush versions table ([#4349](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4349))
- Do not throw an exception when valid JSON data evaluates to empty PHP data ([#4342](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4342))
- Simpler dcf template ([#4354](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4354))
- Fix SQL user creation with MariaDB ([#4364](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4364)) 
- Output correct data for machine readable formats when active and imported config are identical. ([#4340](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4340))
- Add deploy:hook command for hook_deploy_NAME "update hooks" ([#4365](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4365))
- Don't use the UpdateKernel for config:import. ([#4368](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4368))
- Add cache clear to early part of deploy. ([#4375](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4375)) 
- Fix [#4371](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4371). Reunite ConfigImportCommands classes. They no longer need the UpdateKernel ([#4374](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4374))
- Log Drupal messages during site:install by registering a logger service in Drupal container ([#4378](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4378))
- Document how to rerun watchdog:show every 2 seconds. ([#4381](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4381)) 
- Add command to export .po files ([#3253](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3253))
- Declare the minimum supported version of Robo ([#4441](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4441))

Bugfix release primarily fixing issues to support:

- Drupal 9 ([#4408](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4408))
- PHP 7.4 ([#4362](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4362))
- Mysql 8 ([#4313](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4313) & [#4261](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4261))

- Escape command name in RedispatchToSiteLocal. ([#4307](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4307))
- Allow for showing DB creds when running SQL commands ([#4316](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4316))
- Fix [#4317](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4317). Fix Windows error when trying to drush uli into a remote site using an alias.
- Fix [#4319](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4319). missing application/gzip mime type ([#4320](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4320))
- Fix locale import usage example ([#4321](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4321))
- Add another DrushTT example from Scheduler module. [ba37f21](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/ba37f21)
- Refactor alwaysQuery for Oracle. ([#4335](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4335))
- Drupal 9.0 compat - ConfigImport ([#4336](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4336))

* [4dea224](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/4dea224)b - Remove unhelpful help text after drush terminated abnormally.
* 661db961 - Fix [#3867](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3867). Improve rsync confirmation message. (10 weeks ago
* [b6350ca](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/b6350ca)d - Remove old example from sql:sync help.
* b0a2a2e4 - Closes [#4071](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4071) by setting -y to sql-sync command
* [ae6c3b4](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/ae6c3b4)d - Add --items-limit option to queue:run command ([#4121](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4121))
* [8848863](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/8848863)b - Expand examples for drush ssh command. (4 months ago)
* cad7fcf1 - Calculate memory_limit correctly when there is no suffix
* [9ced786](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/9ced786)c - Issue-4208: Fix User:login command incorrect url handling
* [61f78fd](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/61f78fd)e - fix warning in site:install
* 08316911 - Replace classy with stark in EnDisUnListInfoCase::testEnDisUnList
* 87b6e789 - Use CAPS for env variables in examples.
* b59f72e2 - Do not throw exception if cron is already running ([#4162](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4162))
* 90e5acf7 - Fix [#4160](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4160). Make method non-static.
* ef24b8e2 - Allow symfony/event-dispatcher 4.x.
* [1f5b487](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/1f5b487)a - Fixes . Escape rsync params.
* [ab23651](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/ab23651)f - Remove usage of prepareLegacyRequest().
* 471d9ae7 - Remove unused method on test class.
* 359fa136 - Add documentation on wildcard aliases ([#4113](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4113))

- Use Drupal's new core-recommended template in Unish. ([#4304](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4304))
- Add missing base theme key (affects Drupal 9). ([#4309](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4309))

- Drush site-install fails with MySQL 8 [#4259](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4259) 
- Adding extra information about symlinked packaged commands, see [#4290](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4290)
- Tolerate an unrecognized DB Driver during site:install and bootstrap [#4295](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4295)
- Change from an exception to warning in site:install [f93ee99](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/f93ee99)
- Better error message when dropping tables. [4906f6c](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/4906f6c) 
- Remove unused SqlBase::delete [f5dc954](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/f5dc954) 
- Bump Unish's Drupal 9 testing to PHP 7.3 [f10313c](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/f10313c) 
- Stop using CONFIG_SYNC_DIRECTORY. ([#4301](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4301))
- Fix [#4098](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4098). In Drush config, stop using sql.db-su in favor of just db-su. ([#4302](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4302)). 
- Fix [#4275](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4275). Adjust install instructions for recommended-project.

- Add Usage example to sql:query linking to [#3071](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3071).
- Remove unhelpful help text after drush terminated abnormally.
- Change log level to debug for 'broaden constraint' warning.
- Bring back drush_log() to avoid fatal errors from older commandfiles.

- Add `cache:tags` command to purge content by tag. ([#4267](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4267)) 
- Allow symfony/var-dumper version 5. [637f2aa](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/637f2aa)
- Fix [#4256](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4256). Insufficient Error messages on failing SQL commands during site:install
- Use entity_field.manager in user field sanitize plugin. Drupal 9 compat. [#4270](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4270)
- More Drupal 9 compat [#4272](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4272) [#4273](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4273) 
- Use PHP 7.3.7 exclusively at Appveyor. [#4271](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4271)
- Fix userTest on Windows. [493467f](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/493467f) 
- Improve rsync confirm message [aa47e57](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/aa47e57)a
- Stop sending â€”backend during sql:sync calls ([#4247](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4247))
- site:install doesn't re-use a db connection already in settings.php ([#4244](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4244))

Drush 10 removes many deprecated APIs and functions. It's lean and clean. Drush 10 works great with improvements in the upcoming Drupal 8.8, like the new [Config Transform](https://www.drupal.org/node/3066005) and [Exclude](https://www.drupal.org/node/3079028) APIs.

Commandfiles written for Drush 9 are often already compatible with Drush 10. All you should do is expand the constraint in your module's composer.json (see `extra/drush` section). See [this patch from Devel module](https://www.drupal.org/project/devel/issues/3071228). Commandfiles that aren't part of modules don't need any composer.json changes.

Drush 10 should work fine when making remote calls into a Drush 9.6+ environment. This helps during the brief period when you upgrade to Drush 10 locally but still need to make calls into a Prod instance that is still on Drush 9.

name: 10.0.0-rc5
body:
- Allow Robo 2 ([#4206](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4206))
- Fix arguments in pm:security test.

name: 10.0.0-rc4
body:
-  Fix [#3903](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3903). Remove default DatabaseConnection during early bootstrap in site:install ([#4230](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4230))
-  Initial Drupal 9 compat. ([#4232](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4232))

name: 10.0.0-rc3
body:
- Better message when sql program doesnt exist and Drupal fails to install ([#4185](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4185))
- [#4194](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4194): drush config:status does not respect excluded modules ([#4201](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4201))
- Replace classy with stark in EnDisUnListInfoCase::testEnDisUnList ([#4202](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4202))
- Fix warning in site:install [c875694](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/c875694) 
- Issue-3636: Generate sample values only for supported field types. ([#4198](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4198))
- Issue-4208: Fix User:login command incorrect url handling ([#4209](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4209))
- Add option to exclude entities by ID to entity:delete command. ([#4175](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4175))
- Calculate memory_limit correctly when there is no suffix ([#4187](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4187)) 
- Add --items-limit option to queue:run command ([#4121](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4121)) 
- Use the UpdateKernel for config:import. ([#4217](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4217))
- Remove drush init from install docs. Its a relic. ([#4222](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4222)) 
- Closes [#4071](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4071) by setting -y to sql-sync command ([#4223](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4223)) 
- Clear the config cache after a config import ([#4224](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4224)) 
- Fix config import with `--partial` ([#4228](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4228))

name: 10.0.0-rc2
body:
- Drush commandfile generator should declare 10 as compat version [5d72735](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/5d72735) 
- Reduce commandfile compat errors from warning to info. ([#4176](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4176)) 
- Still load incompat commandfiles ([#4179](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4179)) 
- Add unix socket configuration to mysql credentials ([#4173](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4173))

name: 10.0.0-rc1
body:
Drush 10 removes many deprecated APIs and functions. It's lean and clean. Drush 10 has no new commands/features relative to Drush 9.7.

Commandfiles written for Drush 9 are likely already compatible with Drush 10. All you must do is expand the constraint in your module's composer.json (see `extra/drush` section). See [this patch from Devel module](https://www.drupal.org/project/devel/issues/3071228). Commandfiles that aren't part of modules don't need any composer.json changes.

Drush 10 should work fine when making remote calls into a Drush 9.6+ environment. Please report any bugs.

Your [feedbac](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/feedbac)k is most appreciated.

- Fix [#4152](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4152) symfony/event_dispatcher version requirements
- Fix [#4160](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4160). Make method non-static. ([#4161](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4161)) 
- Expand examples for drush ssh command. [88d5b0c](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/88d5b0c) 
- Rename .twig to .[type].twig for better syntax highting in editor. ([#4163](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4163))
- Do not throw exception if cron is already running ([#4162](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4162)) 
- Drupal 8.8 for Highest test (functional) ([#4164](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4164)) 
- Run integration and unit tests at Circle ([#4165](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4165)) 
- Change config import and export commands to use the new core API ([#4061](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4061))
- Use CAPS for env variables in examples. ([#4167](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4167))

name: 10.0.0-beta1
body:
A few minor improvements since [alpha1](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/releases/tag/10.0.0-alpha1)

- Constrain our minimum version of webflo/drupal-finder to 1.2 or later [c34e6f5](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/c34e6f5) 
- Profiling info in Logger ([#4147](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4147)) [4933680](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/4933680) 
- Fix Request to have correct base URL ([#4136](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4136)) 
- Escape rsync params. ([#4150](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4150)) [7d4d659](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/7d4d659)

name: 10.0.0-alpha1
body:
Drush 10 removes many deprecated APIs and functions. It's lean and clean. Drush 10 has no new commands/features relative to Drush 9.7.

Commandfiles written for Drush 9 are likely already compatible with Drush 10. All you must do is expand the constraint in your module's composer.json (see `extra/drush` section). See [this patch from Devel module](https://www.drupal.org/project/devel/issues/3071228).

Drush 10 should work fine when making remote calls into a Drush 9.6+ environment. Please report any bugs.

Your [feedbac](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/commit/feedbac)k is most appreciated.
